linearClassifier_test.cpp

00001 //===========================================================================
00054 //===========================================================================
00055 #include "Array/ArrayIo.h"
00056 #include "LinAlg/LinearClassifier.h"
00057 
00058 using namespace std;
00059 
00060 // Number of training vectors:
00061 const unsigned no_train_vecs = 10;
00062 
00063 // Number of test vectors:
00064 const unsigned no_test_vecs = 2;
00065 
00066  
00067 // Values for the training vectors:
00068 double train_vec_values[ 2 * no_train_vecs ] = {
00069     1.79, 51.3,
00070     1.52, 40.9,
00071     1.64, 73.0,
00072     1.67, 64.5,
00073     1.82, 65.9,
00074     1.81, 125.3,
00075     1.62, 100.3,
00076     1.82, 100.1,
00077     2.01, 90.3,
00078     1.8, 51.4
00079 };
00080  
00081 // Numbers of classes, to which the training vectors belong:
00082 unsigned class_no_values[ no_train_vecs ] = {
00083     1,
00084     0,
00085     0,
00086     0,
00087     1,
00088     0,
00089     0,
00090     0,
00091     0,
00092     1
00093 };
00094 
00095 // Values for the test vectors:
00096 double test_vec_values[ 2 * no_test_vecs ] = {
00097     1.80, 65.9,
00098     1.49, 38.5,
00099 }; 
00100  
00101 int main()
00102 {
00103     unsigned          curr_indiv( 0 ),                // Index of current 
00104                                                       // training vector.
00105                       class_no;                       // Resulting class number
00106                                                       // for current test 
00107                                                       // vector.
00108     double            error(0.);                      // Cross validation 
00109                                                       // error.
00110     Array< double >   train_vecs( no_train_vecs, 2 ), // Training vectors.
00111                       test_vecs( no_test_vecs, 2 );   // Test vectors.
00112     Array< unsigned > class_nos( no_train_vecs ),     // The corresponding
00113                                                       // class numbers.
00114                       results( no_train_vecs );       // Classification results
00115                                                       // during cross 
00116                                                       // validation.
00117  
00118  
00119     // Create a Linear Classifier object:
00120     LinearClassifier lc;
00121  
00122     // Assign values for training and test vectors to storage variables:
00123     for ( curr_indiv = 0; curr_indiv < no_train_vecs; curr_indiv++ ) 
00124     {
00125         train_vecs( curr_indiv, 0 ) = train_vec_values[ curr_indiv * 2 ];
00126         train_vecs( curr_indiv, 1 ) = train_vec_values[ curr_indiv * 2 + 1 ];  
00127         class_nos( curr_indiv ) = class_no_values[ curr_indiv ]; 
00128         if ( curr_indiv < no_test_vecs )
00129         {
00130             test_vecs( curr_indiv, 0 ) = test_vec_values[curr_indiv * 2 ];
00131             test_vecs( curr_indiv, 1 ) = test_vec_values[curr_indiv * 2 + 1 ]; 
00132         }
00133     }
00134  
00135     // Train classificator with the training vectors:
00136     cout << "Training classificator..."; 
00137     lc.train( train_vecs, class_nos );  
00138     cout << "done!" << "\n\n";     
00139 
00140     // Evaluate the cross validation error:
00141     lc.leaveOneOut( train_vecs, class_nos, results );
00142     for ( curr_indiv = 0; curr_indiv < no_train_vecs; curr_indiv++ )
00143     {
00144 #ifdef _WIN32
00145         error += abs( (int)class_nos( curr_indiv ) - (int)results( curr_indiv ) );
00146 #else   
00147         error += std::abs( (int)class_nos( curr_indiv ) - (int)results( curr_indiv ) );
00148 #endif
00149     }
00150     error /= no_train_vecs;
00151     cout << "Cross validation error of classificator = " << error << "\n\n";
00152 
00153     // Classification of test vectors and output of result:
00154     for ( curr_indiv = 0; curr_indiv < no_test_vecs; curr_indiv++ )
00155     {
00156         class_no = lc.classify( test_vecs[ curr_indiv ] );
00157         cout << "Test vector: " << endl;
00158         writeArray( test_vecs[ curr_indiv ], cout );
00159         cout << "Resulting class no.: " << class_no << "\n\n";
00160     }
00161 
00162     return 0;
00163 }
